layout.title: Fidel García's Portfolio - Web Developer and Programmer

about.title: About me
about.description:
My name is Edwin Fidel García Távara. I started programming in my career, with an inventory project. I currently work focused on the backend.
Some of my achievements include collaborating on a project for a company in Spain, and creating a crop management system for a company in my country.
My goal is to improve as a developer to become a Software Architect.

banner.title: Edwin Fidel García Távara
banner.subtitle: +2 years of experience. Backend focused Web Developer from Piura, Peru
